message: Let's split fairly, I'll get a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with unfair offers. Take this while it's still a good deal!
Come on, meet me in the middle, it's getting less valuable!
Time is running out, Alice!  This is a strong offer - let's be sensible and split the pot.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want the bigger share
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.  Don't let inflation eat away at our potential winnings!
